info.title: Azure Blueprints
info.description: Azure Blueprints enables the creation of an Azure native package of artifacts (resource groups, policies, role assignments, Resource Manager templates and more) that can be dynamically deployed to subscriptions to create consistent, repeatable environments.

put.description: Create or update a blueprint assignment.

get.description: List blueprint assignments within a subscription.

put.description: Create or update a blueprint definition.

get.description: List artifacts for a given blueprint definition.
List operations for given blueprint assignment within a subscription.

parameters.name: assignmentOperationName
parameters.description: Name of the blueprint assignment operation.

get.description: Get an artifact for a published blueprint definition.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition
